metadata.title: CVE-2025-0239 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: When using Alt-Svc, ALPN did not properly validate certificates when theoriginal server is redirecting to an insecure site. This vulnerabilityaffects Firefox < 134 and Firefox ESR < 128.6.

criterions.comment: mozjs38 package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
